snippet.title: Outliver: Tribulation | Gameplay Overview Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST Our upcoming game "Outliver: Tribulation" on Steam -
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1236930/Outliver_Tribulation/

WISHLIST Our upcoming game "Outliver: Tribulation" on Epic Games - https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/outliver-tribulations-679884

Outliver: Tribulation is an atmospheric, story-rich survival horror third-person shooter about a soldier who finds herself in the Realm of Tribulations, a supernatural realm of African mythology where she has to undergo an ancient ritual to regain passage back to her realm... or so she thinks.

SUBSCRIBE to our mailing list - http://eepurl.com/dcEuJ1

Discord -  https://discord.gg/czHZwNkMb6

Watch our animated short - Story of the Dead: Episode 3 here -
https://youtu.be/3FaVKZSMhDQ

Recommending our channel to friends will be highly appreciated :) 

Socials:
Twitter - https://twitter.com/gbrossoft
YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/user/GbrosSoft
Discord -  https://discord.gg/czHZwNkMb6

--------------------
Happy Gaming!
--------------------
#gamepicks #gbrossoft #steam
